title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 197.5 - Licensing fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 197.5 - Licensing fees

State Regulations
(a) A licensing fee
of $25 must accompany the application. This licensing fee is nonrefundable and
must be in the form of a check or money order, payable to the order of the

Department of Environmental Conservation. (b) Upon successful completion of a written
examination and submission of all required certificates, proofs and statements, as described in this Part, the following additional fee(s) will be due before
the license will be issued: (1)

For a license
in a single category, the remaining licensing fee will be $75. (2)

For each additional activity, an
additional fee of $20 must be paid. (3)

The maximum total for guide licenses in
all six activities will be $200. (c) The fee for all guide license renewals
will be $100 for a single activity and $20 for each additional activity to be
licensed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
197.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
